venue.name: Horse Hill Nature Preserve, just past

item.description:
Note Time Changed to 1:30 PM
There is a snowshoe race at Horsehill in the morning (thanks to Liz Harrington for the heads up) so we are pushing our meetup back to 1:30 PM.

We are hoping that the snowshoe race will be done by 1:30 pm so we can enjoy the trails with our dogs.



Plunk is a big fan of Horse Hill Nature Preserve and decided that THAT is where she wanted to celebrate Liz's birthday !!

So we are meeting at the Nature Preserve for a nice hike in the woods with Liz, Barney and gang. Would love it if more dogs and peeps could join us.

BTW - did I mention that it is Liz's birthday???? If you feel so inclined.....feel free to bring a cupcake for the birthday girl. But don't tell her I said it's her birthday !!!

Horse Hill Nature Preserve has 563 acres of land, open to hikers, bikers, horseback riders and others.

Go to the website listed and find out more, and download a trail map.

We'll be doing the Loop trail. (3.9 miles with lots of side trails to take.)
2 to 2 1/2 hours hiking time.

We'll meet at 184 Amherst Road parking lot.

After the hike we can go out and get a bite to eat if interested.






As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release , hold harmless and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage , injury, and/or other reasons. You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.safehike.com

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Horse Hill Nature Preserve
